text:
It really comes down to
being good to people.

And that can mean trying to
be involved in STEM education

programs to help people lift
themselves out of poverty.

That can also mean giving
people access to class mobility

through physical mobility
and supporting public transit

initiatives, or
working for the MBTA,

like I'm trying
to do this summer.

Or it could even mean just
being a good son-- calling
my mom on a regular basis.

At the end of the day, it's
all about being good to people.
